name: Trulink
description: Trulink is a Web3 link hub and creator platform built on Solana that allows users to showcase their verified crypto identity, connect their audience to key links, and monetize their presence through blockchain-powered tools. The platform enables creators, traders, and projects to share wallet addresses, watchlists, and contract details while launching payment-gated digital offers and accepting peer-to-peer crypto payments. The $TRU token powers premium features, unlocks advanced monetization tools, and acts as the utility layer for the Trulink ecosystem — enabling direct payments, governance, and future integrations. Trulink’s mission is to give users ownership of their identity, audience, and income in a decentralized, trust-based environment.
